    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size, java.awt.Color border, java.awt.Color inner, int strength)

      Parameters:
      name - type of brick
      pos - the position of brick
      size - the size of brick
      border - the color of the border
      inner - the inner color of the border
      strength - the impacts needed to break the brick
